description: Lee has been stealing petty cash for quite some time now but this time he gets caught. His boss La Cherry refuses to put up with this unacceptable behavior and demands an explanation. When Lee has nothing to say for himself Cherry has no choice but to terminate his employment. After admitting to taking the money Lee begs for forgiveness, offering to do anything to keep his job. Even if it means giving La Cherry his tight virgin ass!
title: La Cherry Spice, Lee Stanton
